designScenario.name: Landing Gear System
designScenario.description: Design a next-generation Landing Gear System for a commercial aircraft, integrating adaptive control algorithms, redundant electro-hydrostatic actuation (EHA), predictive health monitoring, and lightweight composite materials. The system must ensure operational reliability under extreme conditions (e.g., crosswind landings, contaminated runways) while enabling real-time diagnostics and energy-efficient performance.

details.description: The system must autonomously adjust deployment speed based on airspeed, altitude, and turbulence data to prevent structural overstress.
Integrated obstacle detection sensors must prevent gear extension during ground proximity alerts.
Shock absorbers must dissipate 95% of vertical kinetic energy within 0.8 seconds during touchdown at 3.5 m/s sink rate.
Electro-hydrostatic actuators shall achieve full gear extension in <2.5 seconds at -40°C ambient temperature.
Triple-redundant control channels (electronic, fiber-optic, mechanical) must independently initiate emergency gear deployment.
Passive gravity-assisted free-fall mechanism activates automatically if primary/secondary systems fail.
Modular assembly design enabling component replacement in <45 minutes without full gear disassembly.
Corrosion-resistant titanium alloys and CFRP composites meeting FAA 25.729 fatigue life requirements.

systemComponents.name: Smart Actuation Controller
systemComponents.description: AI-powered control unit with federated learning capabilities for optimizing gear dynamics based on historical operational data.

subComponents.name: Neural Processing Unit
subComponents.description: Dedicated hardware for real-time actuator trajectory optimization

subComponents.name: Fault Detection Isolation Unit
subComponents.description: Triple-voting comparator for critical command validation

systemComponents.name: Electro-Hydrostatic Actuation System
systemComponents.description: Self-contained hydraulic power units with regenerative energy recovery during gear retraction.

subComponents.name: Compact Power Pack
subComponents.description: 10 kW brushless motor driving variable displacement piston pump

subComponents.name: Accumulator Module
subComponents.description: Cellular silicone accumulator for peak power demand management

systemComponents.name: Morphing Shock Strut
systemComponents.description: Magnetorheological fluid-based damper with variable stiffness tuning via electromagnetic field control.

subComponents.name: MR Fluid Cartridge
subComponents.description: Temperature-stable magnetorheological fluid matrix with 200 kPa yield stress

subComponents.name: Flux Modulation Coil
subComponents.description: High-frequency electromagnetic field generator for viscosity control

systemComponents.name: Sensor Fusion Module
systemComponents.description: Multi-physics sensor array measuring structural loads, vibration spectra, and hydraulic fluid condition.

subComponents.name: Fiber Bragg Grating Array
subComponents.description: Embedded optical strain sensors in critical load paths

subComponents.name: Tribo-dynamic Analyzer
subComponents.description: In-line fluid particulate counter with dielectric spectroscopy

relationships.description: Bi-directional data exchange between control algorithms and distributed sensor network for closed-loop actuation
Hydraulic power delivery to MR fluid control circuits dependent on actuation system pressure stability
Integrated strain and acceleration sensors form part of the strut's health monitoring subsystem
Controller directly manages power electronics embedded within each electro-hydrostatic actuator

attributes.name: peakVerticalLoad
attributes.description: Maximum certified vertical load capacity during rejected takeoff scenario

attributes.name: actuationEfficiency
attributes.description: Energy recaptured during gear retraction for auxiliary system power

attributes.name: failureDetectionTime
attributes.description: Maximum allowable latency for critical fault detection and containment

attributes.name: maintenanceInterval
attributes.description: Minimum service life between major overhauls under normal operating conditions

attributes.name: thermalOperatingRange
attributes.description: Full functional temperature envelope including de-icing operations
